name: Muffin Data
headline: Modern analytics for CPG brands
description: Muffin Data is a turnkey data platform and reporting solution for consumer packaged goods (CPG) brands. We combine proprietary data sets with automated ingestion from industry-specific data sources to provide a clear and unified view of in-store sales performance, product distribution, and supply chain health.

founders.name: Andres Recalde, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Muffin Data working to provide analytics solutions for leading Food & Beverage brands. Formerly at Banza, Gopuff, La Colombe, and RJMetrics.

founders.name: Sal Calvo, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Muffin Data building the single source of truth for CPG brands. Formerly at WhatsApp, Facebook, Stanford MS&E, RJMetrics. Talk to me about data warehousing + product growth.

[book a demo](http://www.muffindata.com/</book-a-demo>)[Log in](http://www.muffindata.com/<https:/app.muffindata.com/>)
# Simple analytics for food and beverage brands
Muffin Data is the analytics platform for emerging brands, focused on **ease of use** , **clear answers** , and **customization**.
[Book a demo](http://www.muffindata.com/</book-a-demo>)
Trusted by modern brands like
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65b0fb9e40f1a853a61b0c92_icons-2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65b0fb9ed4655faa9e84c771_icons-1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/6715e3aa416361160c7857b2_logo-enlightened.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65b0fb9e0823332dc97857a8_icons-3.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/6715e3aa9ac7b02289a7db74_logo-ghia.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/6715e3aa44f29fdd8386f8db_logo-bbbb.png)
## Purpose-built for CPG operators
No matter your role or use case, the **Muffin Data Platform** generates value and new insights, while automating data workflows and saving your time. 
### Explore Muffin Data for...
[Sales & Marketing Teams](http://www.muffindata.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Ops Teams](http://www.muffindata.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Executives](http://www.muffindata.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d3c245f2fa7982e2e2aaf8_Measure%20Promo%20Success%20\(1\).png)
### Measure promo success
Automatically detect the lifts in your promotions without ever opening a spreadsheet
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c285faeceb73ef8b6d1877_Build%20beautiful%20viz.png)
### Build beautiful viz
Our chart building tool helps you create the most beautiful charts for your next buyer pitch deck
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c285fa7525440ae08f9c21_Track%20sales%20and%20velocity.png)
### Track sales and velocity
Watch your products' velocities across all accounts to take action on low performers and plan around top sellers 
_"Muffin Data’s seamless sales and velocity visualizations have revolutionized how we understand our in-market performance — empowering us to tailor and optimize media plans and promotions with speed and precision."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65b0fb9e0823332dc97857a8_icons-3.svg)
**AJ Casella** _Director, Lifecycle and Digital Marketing_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d3c2a6b5da297f60166498_Detect%20Out%20of%20Stocks.png)
### **Detect out-of-stocks**
Drill into OOS events at location level and benchmark prevalence by account
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d3c3cef58827c096bed965_Inform%20your%20forecast%20\(1\).png)
### Inform your forecast
Use sales and distribution data to demand plan and generate sales forecasts
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c285fa7525440ae08f9be8_Monitor%20your%20inventory%20levels.png)
### Monitor inventory levels
Keep an eye on unit counts at every major DC so your team can prevent voids downstream
 _"Muffin Data enables us to operate more effectively as a business. Having access to timely, reliable sales data is essential to building and maintaining our forecast, which in turn allows us to make critical production and purchasing decisions."_
**Nick C.**_VP, Business Operations_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65fbfe517df04a64b3902c90_Muffin%20Data%20Q1%20Frame%202%20\(1\).png)
 _"Muffin Data elegantly solves so many of the pain points around wholesale data, from consumption to demand. The out-of-the-box dashboards give us insights that would otherwise take us months to build, and the 'create your own' feature allows us to dive even deeper."_
**Tesia Zhou** _Director, Strategy and Finance_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65b0fb9e40f1a853a61b0c92_icons-2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c285facc4d256ba12719b3_Track%20the%20entire%20business.png)
### Track the entire business
Gain a holistic view into sales, velocity, and distribution for all large retailers and distributors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c285f92da778922a24a7f5_Save%20dozens%20of%20hours%20per%20week.png)
### Save dozens of hours per week
Transform your team’s productivity by eliminating time spent on manual portal pulls, Excel model refreshes, and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c285f9dcd5e806c7910f54_Monitor%20the%20competition.png)
### Monitor the competition
See how your brand's sales and market share match up against competitors in your category
 _"The reliability and timeliness of the data that Muffin Data delivers exceeds expectations, and the standardization of item and account hierarchies powers trustworthy retail insights in a historically opaque and error-prone part of the business. The Muffin Data team consistently impresses us with their industry knowledge and technical capabilities."_
**Chris B.**_VP, Insights & Analytics_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65fbfe517df04a64b3902c90_Muffin%20Data%20Q1%20Frame%202%20\(1\).png)
 _"Using Muffin Data to automate pulling data from our partners has been a game changer. In the past, we needed to have an employee manually pull dozens of files weekly, and in some cases daily. Now, we've freed up that bandwidth and get those same datasets clean, quick, and accurate."_
**Jim Roddy** _Sr. Director, Data and Insights_
## Fully featured
We've built the **Muffin Data Platform** to be the single most advanced analytics tool for the CPG industry.
Supercharge your forecasts
Our baselining algorithm automatically detects **incremental volume** , so you can measure organic demand, see promo lift, and prepare **unbiased forecasts**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65c1a936ceb96956d64d5755_Baseline%20Pic.png)
**Drill into store activity**
Dive deeper than ever into sales on the ground. The Muffin Data Platform performs **product** **and** **location standardization** so you can track activity at the store level
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65caa0c8a18e27c19ef901cf_270shots_so.png)
Monitor DCs with ease
Dive into DC-level **inventory counts** andshipment**fill rates** to ensure operational excellence
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65bb352f55e5eaeb853680e1_876shots_so.png)
Build any report you want
Need a chart we didn't think of? **Customization** is a first-class feature, so you can build reports and collaborate with your team at will
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65ca9bd1a1cff7490189dc05_Customize.png)
## How it works
The **Muffin Data Platform** automatically syncs your brand's data from your retailers and distributors, and serves up insights in an analytics layer. **And you don't have to lift a finger.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d3c48ea3c2b45b30d08181_Raw%20Data%20Capture.png)
### Raw Data Capture
Automatic retrieval of POS sales, shipments and inventory data from a variety of integrations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d3c49968f09afd75f0b6a0_Transformation%20and%20Modeling.png)
### Transformation and Modeling
Standardization into a normalized data warehouse, custom-built for your brand
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d3c4a42eebec4f21de8ddb_Analytics%20and%20Reporting.png)
### Analytics and Reporting
Standard analytics out of the box, with the ability to customize, drill down, and export
## Work with us
We love working with modern brands who are ready to level up their data stack. If that sounds like you, let's chat.
[Book a Demo](http://www.muffindata.com/</book-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65d2a40b6385110ea59c50dc_Muffin%20PNGs.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b0c53921bf2bb2cb71a2db/65b0cfc16cceb19438fb0a76_logo-secondary.png)](http://www.muffindata.com/</>)
[Use Cases](http://www.muffindata.com/</#use-cases>)[Features](http://www.muffindata.com/</#features>)[About](http://www.muffindata.com/</about-us>)[Book a Demo](http://www.muffindata.com/</book-a-demo>)[Login](http://www.muffindata.com/<https:/analytics.muffindata.com/>)
© 2024 Muffin Data. All rights reserved.
[Privacy Policy](http://www.muffindata.com/</privacy-policy>)

generated_description:
**Muffin Data: Simplifying Analytics for CPG Brands**

Muffin Data is on a mission to transform the analytics landscape for consumer packaged goods (CPG) brands. Founded in 2022 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W23, this agile startup combines proprietary datasets with automated data ingestion from industry-specific sources, allowing brands to visualize in-store sales performance, product distribution, and supply chain health with remarkable clarity.

Located in an undisclosed area (sometimes startups are a bit secretive), Muffin Data operates with a slim team of two. This small yet dynamic group is dedicated to developing a user-friendly analytics platform that emphasizes simplicity, clarity, and customization—a refreshing change in an industry often bogged down by complexity.

### The Platform

At its core, the Muffin Data Platform is designed specifically for the unique challenges faced by CPG operators. Here are some standout features:

- **Automated Insights**: Say goodbye to manual spreadsheets. The platform automatically detects promotional lifts and provides insights into sales and inventory levels, all without requiring users to lift a finger.
  
- **Sales and Velocity Tracking**: Users can effortlessly monitor product velocities across various accounts, making it easy to identify both high-performers and low-sellers.
  
- **Custom Reporting**: Need a report that isn’t standard? Muffin Data offers robust customization features that empower teams to build tailored reports as necessary.

- **Holistic View**: Gain a comprehensive perspective of sales, distribution, and market position against competitors—critical for strategic planning in a fast-paced market.

### Customer Success

Muffin Data is already making waves with modern brands, underscoring how data can revolutionize strategies and operations. Clients have praised the platform for its reliability and usability, noting that it allows teams to save significant time on manual data handling, thereby increasing productivity.

### The Team

Guided by Group Partner Aaron Epstein, Muffin Data is keenly aware of the industry's needs. Their small size allows for swift decision-making and a focus on building deep, meaningful relationships with clients.

### Join the Revolution

If you represent a CPG brand tired of the usual complexities surrounding data management and analytics, Muffin Data might be what you're looking for. They invite brands ready to elevate their data capabilities to connect and explore their demo offerings.

For more insights into what they offer, check out their website at [Muffin Data](http://www.muffindata.com). 

In a nutshell, Muffin Data exemplifies how emerging tech can simplify the data journey for brands, making analytics accessible—and maybe even fun—in the CPG sector.
